TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationManifest extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationManifest Inherits AssemblyManifest

summary.span: 描述 ClickOnce 或原生 Win32 應用程式資訊清單。

span.span: Describes a ClickOnce or native Win32 application manifest.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: A token that represents a version of the .NET Framework.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConfigFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式組態檔。

span.span: Gets or sets the application configuration file.

value.span: 字串，表示應用程式組態檔的名稱。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於原生 Win32 資訊清單，會忽略這項輸入。For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides Property EntryPoint As AssemblyReference

public: virtual property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::AssemblyReference ^ EntryPoint { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::AssemblyReference ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::AssemblyReference ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定代表應用程式進入點的組件參考。

span.span: Gets or sets an assembly reference that represents the entry point of the application.

value.span: 物件，代表應用程式的進入點。

span.span: An object that represents the entry point of the application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorReportUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定錯誤報告的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the error report.

value.span: 包含錯誤報告 URL 的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the URL of the error report.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileAssociations As FileAssociationCollection

summary.span: 取得或設定資訊清單中定義的檔案關聯。

span.span: Gets or sets the file associations that are defined in the manifest.

value.span: 包含檔案關聯的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the file associations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HostInBrowser { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定應用程式是否裝載於瀏覽器中 (與 WPF Web 瀏覽器應用程式相同)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the application is hosted in a browser (as WPF Web Browser Applications are).

value.span: 布林值，這個值表示即將部署的應用程式會裝載在瀏覽器 ()，或者不會裝載在瀏覽器 ()。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the application being deployed will be hosted in a browser (), or not ().

value.span: 僅適用於 WPF Web 瀏覽器應用程式。

span.span: applies only to WPF Web Browser Applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 網頁瀏覽器應用程式以外的專案類型，您應該設定至`False`（預設值）。For project types other than WPF Web Browser Applications, you should set to `False` (the default value). 當您部署 WPF 瀏覽器應用程式時，您必須設定屬性`True`。When you deploy a WPF Web Browser Application, you must set the property to `True`. 這會導致``標記加入至產生的應用程式資訊清單。This causes the `` tag to be added to the generated application manifest. 這個標記可讓 ClickOnce 部署瀏覽器裝載應用程式的專案，其中包含.xbap 的檔案。This tag enables ClickOnce to deploy projects for browser-hosted applications, which contain .xbap files. 您也必須使用應用程式只能在線上藉由設定至`False`。You will also have to make the application available only online by setting to `False`. 如果不這麼做，您會收到[MSBuild 錯誤 MSB3116](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e)。If you do not do this, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ IconFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定程式圖示檔。

span.span: Gets or sets the program icon file.

value.span: 代表圖示檔名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the icon file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程式圖示表示產生的應用程式資訊清單中，用於**啟動**功能表和**新增或移除程式**。The program icon is expressed in the generated application manifest and is used for the **Start** menu and **Add or Remove Programs**. 如果有此圖示檔未指定，會使用預設圖示。If this the icon file is not specified, a default icon is used. 對於原生 Win32 資訊清單，會忽略這項輸入。For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsClickOnceManifest { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定資訊清單是否為 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單或原生 Win32 應用程式資訊清單。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the manifest is a ClickOnce application manifest or a native Win32 application manifest.

value.span: 布林值，指出資訊清單是 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單 () 或是原生 Win32 應用程式資訊清單 ()。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the manifest is a ClickOnce application manifest () or a native Win32 manifest ().

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxTargetPath { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定 ClickOnce 應用程式部署中允許的檔案路徑長度上限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum allowed length of a file path in a ClickOnce application deployment.

summary.span: 如果指定這個值，則會根據這項限制來檢查應用程式中的每個檔案路徑長度。

span.span: If this value is specified, the length of each file path in the application is checked against this limit.

summary.span: 任何超過限制的項目都會產生警告訊息。

span.span: Any items that exceed the limit cause a warning message.

summary.span: 如果這項輸入未指定或為零，則不會執行任何檢查。

span.span: If this input is not specified or is zero, no checking is performed.

summary.span: 對於原生 Win32 資訊清單，會忽略這項輸入。

span.span: For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.

value.span: 整數，表示 ClickOnce 應用程式部署中允許的檔案路徑長度上限。

span.span: An integer that indicates the maximum allowed length of a file path in a ClickOnce application deployment.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OSDescription { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定作業系統相依性的文字描述。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies a textual description for the operating system dependency.

value.span: 字串，表示作業系統相依性。

span.span: A string that indicates the operating system dependency.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OSSupportUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定作業系統相依性的支援 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies a support URL for the operating system dependency.

value.span: 表示作業系統相依性之支援 URL 的字串。

span.span: A string indicating the support URL for the operating system dependency.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OSVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定應用程式所需的最小必要作業系統版本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the minimum required operating system version required by the application.

value.span: 字串，表示應用程式所需的最小必要作業系統版本。

span.span: A string that indicates the minimum required operating system version required by the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定應用程式所需的最低作業系統版本。Specifies the minimum operating system version required by the application. 範例值是"5.1.2600.0"Windows xp。An example value is "5.1.2600.0" for Windows XP. 如果未指定此輸入，會使用預設值。If this input is not specified, a default value is used. 預設值是支援的最低作業系統的.NET Framework 中，也就是 「 4.10.0.0 」 的 Windows 98SE。The default value is the minimum supported operating system of the .NET Framework, which is "4.10.0.0" for Windows 98SE. 不過，如果應用程式包含任何原生模式或免 COM 參考，預設值是 Windows XP。However, if the application contains any native or Reg-Free COM references, the default is Windows XP. 對於原生 Win32 資訊清單，會忽略這項輸入。For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Product { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，此值會指定專案檔中的 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the property in the project file.

value.span: 對應到專案檔之 屬性的字串值。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至`ProductName`專案檔中的屬性。This property corresponds to the `ProductName` property in the project file. 預設為 null。The default is null. 如果`ProductName`為 null 和是`True`，RegisteredOrganization 值在登錄中的寫入至應用程式資訊清單。If `ProductName` is null and is `True`, the RegisteredOrganization value in the registry is written to the application manifest. 如果 RegisteredOrganization 也是 null，則會使用組件名稱。If RegisteredOrganization is also null, the assembly name is used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Publisher { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，此值會指定專案檔中的 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the property in the project file.

value.span: 對應到專案檔之 屬性的字串值。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至`PublisherName`專案檔中的屬性。This property corresponds to the `PublisherName` property in the project file. 預設為 null。The default is null. 如果`PublisherName`為 null 和是`True`，組件名稱會寫入應用程式資訊清單。If `PublisherName` is null and is `True`, the assembly name is written to the application manifest.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SuiteName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資訊清單中定義的套件名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the suite name that is defined in the manifest.

value.span: 包含套件名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the suite name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SupportUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，此值會指定專案檔中的 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the property in the project file.

value.span: 對應到專案檔之 屬性的字串值。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至`SupportUrl`專案檔中的屬性。This property corresponds to the `SupportUrl` property in the project file. 預設為 null。The default is null. 如果`SupportUrl`為 null 和是`True`，空的字串寫入應用程式資訊清單。If `SupportUrl` is null and is `True`, an empty string is written to the application manifest.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TargetFrameworkVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定表示 .NET Framework 版本的語彙基元。

span.span: Gets or sets a token that represents a version of the .NET Framework.

value.span: ，表示 .NET Framework 的版本。

span.span: A that represents a version of the .NET Framework.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::TrustInfo ^ TrustInfo { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::TrustInfo ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::TrustInfo ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定可定義應用程式安全性的信任物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies a trust object that defines the application security.

value.span: 定義應用程式安全性的 物件。

span.span: A object that defines the application security.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseApplicationTrust { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定 、 和 屬性是否會寫入應用程式資訊清單。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the , , and properties are written to the application manifest.

value.span: 布林值，指出 、 和 屬性是否會寫入應用程式資訊清單。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the , , and properties are written to the application manifest.

value.span: 如果值是 ，會將這些屬性寫入應用程式資訊清單。

span.span: If the value is , they are written to the application manifest.

value.span: 如果值是 ，則會忽略這些屬性。

span.span: If the value is , these properties are ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設， ， ，和屬性會設定為 null。By default, the , , and properties are set to null. 才會使用是`True`。They are used only if is `True`. 如果這個屬性是`True`，這些屬性的值會寫入應用程式資訊清單中的對應標記。If this property is `True`, the values of these properties are written to the corresponding tags in the application manifest. 如果是`False`（預設值），會忽略這些屬性。If is `False` (the default value), these properties are ignored. 這個屬性會對應至`UseApplicationTrust`專案檔中的屬性。This property corresponds to the `UseApplicationTrust` property in the project file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Validate() cil managed

summary.span: 執行各種檢查，以確認資訊清單是否有效。

span.span: Performs various checks to verify the validity of the manifest.

summary.span: 在 物件中會報告任何產生的錯誤或警告。

span.span: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前呼叫這個方法，您必須設定屬性，以便驗證可以確認針對正確版本的.NET Framework 執行階段應用程式資訊清單。Before calling this method, you must set the property so that the validation can verify application manifest against the correct version of the .NET Framework runtime.
